Nightlight/PErceptor:

Nightlight went offline but her spark started to pulsing and with every beat 
it was slowly fading.

"Turn HER ON!!!!!" Yelled angry PErceptor"You're murdering her!!!!!"



-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Thursday, January 13, 2011 11:41 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening/nighlight

> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight�s vital signals started to be eratical, dangerous eratical.
>
> Perceptor frowned and said �this is no good�

<NEW>

Bump jerked his hand back from the button as if his hand had been
stung by the act of pushing it. "What happened?!?" He said, his voice
high pitched and nervous.

"Relax." Legacy said, his voice cold and quiet. "Remember we are
rebooting her entire system, this required her to go offline for a few
moments."

Santon nodded as he ran a scaner over Nightlight, "You might be right,
but she had better come back around soon or else her spark will go
out."

In the background the flat sound could be heard from the monitors
showing that all of Nightlight's sytstems were totally offline.

"Her systems are in the midst of a complete self reboot. She will
restart in ten seconds." Legacy turned back to his console to monitor
his the progress.

"5 seconds . . ." Legacy said as he tapped a few controls.

Bump looked at Santon nervously, obviously neither of them were
completely familiar with this risky proceedure.

"3 seconds . . . " Legacy called out in his cold timeless voice. " 2 .
. . 1 . . .

*KUTCHUNK*

All the power went out in the medical lab, as the computers and
monitors shut off and the room plunged into complete and utter
darkness!

"Scrap!" Santon said somewhere in the darkness.

(TAG)

Preston
